profile.name: Maxime Ryckebusch
profile.title: Systems and Network Administrator
profile.subtitle: Sociable and dynamic IT technician, specialized in systems and networks with a solid background in cybersecurity.
profile.description: Conscientious and persistent, I have hands-on experience in customer support, server configuration, and IT tools deployment. Motivated by problem-solving and infrastructure optimization, I quickly adapt to technical environments and user needs.

contact.degree: Graduated with a BTS in Cybersecurity, IT and Networks, Electronics

support.description: User assistance and resolution of technical issues.

nas.description: Setup and administration of a NAS server with personal drive, Plex server, reverse proxy, load balancer, honeypot, and domain name management.

admin.description: Implementation and management of Microsoft Azure, Intune, and Active Directory.

maintenance.description: Customer support, workstation configuration and setup, diagnostics, software maintenance, and computer assembly.

bts.diploma: BTS Cybersecurity, IT and Networks - IT and Networks option

bac.diploma: Technological Baccalaureate STI2D, specialization in Information Systems and Digital Technology

skills.maintenance: Diagnostics, user support, hardware/software troubleshooting, workstation configuration
